channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Here are the 5 Startup Battlefield finalists at TechCrunch Disrupt 2025
item.description: After two days full of live demos and pitches, it's time to announce the five finalists at this year's Startup Battlefield.

item.title: LG Uplus is latest South Korean telco to confirm cybersecurity incident
item.description: Korean telecom giant LG Uplus is the third major phone provider in the past six months to report a cybersecurity incident.

item.title: Flipkart’s Super.money teams up with Kotak811 to make India’s free UPI payments pay
item.description: The partnership aims to issue about 2 million fixed-deposit-backed credit cards in the next 12 months.

item.title: CEO of spyware maker Memento Labs confirms one of its government customers was caught using its malware
item.description: Security researchers found a government hacking campaign that relies on Windows spyware developed by surveillance tech maker Memento Labs. When reache...

item.title: Apple’s Family Sharing Helps Keep Children Safe. Until It Doesn’t
item.description: When families break down, the systems put in place to protect children online can fall apart too.

item.title: Rainfall Buries a Mega-Airport in Mexico
item.description: New Mexico City International Airport was canceled when only half built, and has since been flooded and restored into wetlands.

item.title: OnlyFans Goes to Business School
item.description: In its first foray into business content, the platform has asked lingerie entrepreneur and ex-SuicideGirl Rachael McCrary to teach creators how to mon...

item.title: Tata Motors confirms it fixed security flaws, which exposed company and customer data
item.description: A security researcher found the Indian automotive giant exposing personal information of its customers, internal company reports, and dealers’ data. T...

item.title: Acer Nitro V 16 AI Review: The Best Budget Gaming Laptop
item.description: It’s not perfect, but this sub-$900 Acer gaming laptop compromises in the right spots and delivers exceptional value.

item.title: The Director of a Raunchy 3-Hour Dracula Movie Says AI Is Gross and Slimy. That’s Why He Used It
item.description: Radu Jude’s AI-filled adaptation features Dracula doing porn and exploiting tech workers.
